abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would finance the
            improvement and engineering supervision of
            N'Gaoundere-Garoua road (273 km) and Tiko-Victoria road
            (22 km); an engineering study and the construction of
            N'Gaoundere by-pass (4 km); and feasibility and
            detailed engineering studies of Garoua-Mora road (254 km)
            and Douala-Pont du Nkam road (180 km).
